title: The Coder and the Compass

characters.name: Elara Voss
characters.description: Precision, speed, composure. Believes control is the only way to prevent failure.

characters.name: Patch
characters.description: A rescue cat. Quirks: sits on warm electronics; appears during quiet moments.

protagonist.name: Elara Voss
protagonist.flaw: Believes control is the only way to prevent failure.

setting: High-stakes tech company in a financial district. Glass walls, cold amber lights.
theme: The shift from rigid control to fluid integration.
glitch_concept: A sync error in Node 04 that mirrors the protagonist's internal conflict.
